cocktails.name: Battle Creek
instructions: Shake and Double strain into chilled Coupe glass, Top with honey mascarpone foam, and sprinkle flakey salt on top.

cocktails.name: Little Wild Horse
instructions: Smoke sage under upside cocktail glass. While smoking, stir ingredients in mixing glass with cubed ice. Turn cocktail glass right-side up and fill with fresh cubed ice. Strain missing glass, and garnish with dried pina flower and sage leaf.

cocktails.name: M&M
instructions: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe with one side dipped in Tajin.

cocktails.name: Silver Star
instructions: Shake and strain into Coupe glass. Kaffir Lime leaf garnish.

ingredients.name: Coconut Fat Washed Mi Campo Tequila

cocktails.name: Eagle Nest
instructions:
Egg white
Shake with ice, then dry shake, strain into frozen glass. Spritz with absinthe.
Macha Syrup
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
2 spoon matcha
Combine in saucepan over medium heat. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Let cool, then pour into a glass container and seal tightly.

cocktails.name: Golden Label
instructions: BUILD IN CAMP MUG, Garnish with Biscoff Cookie.

cocktails.name: DodgeS
instructions:
Whip cream/ micro plane chocolate
BUILD IN GOBLET

cocktails.name: The Bank
instructions: BUILD IN GOBLET. Spritz with CBD oil.

cocktails.name: Red Light
instructions: Stir and strain into cocktail glass with cubed ice. Garnish with a bruleed banana.

ingredients.name: Campari infused coco nibs (750 ml campri 280 ml coco nibs for 18 hours)

cocktails.name: Mchenry House
instructions: Stir and strain into cocktail glass with cubed ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Grizzly
instructions: Stir and strain into mason jar with cubed ice. Garnish with luxardo cherries.

cocktails.name: BoganS
instructions: Build in Collins glass with cubed ice. Top with Ginger beer. Garnish with cucumber ribbon and celery leaf bouquet.

cocktails.name: Mr. Loverledge & Thorpe
instructions: Shake and Strain into Collins glass with Cubed ice. Top of with topo chico grapefruit soda. Garnish with dehydrated Grapefruit wheel.

cocktails.name: Capen & Goodrich
instructions: Shake and Strain into Cocktail glass. Top with Sour beer (Kveik from shades of pale brewing).

cocktails.name: The Cozy
instructions: Shake and strain into Campfire washed coupe. Micro plane chocolate garnish.
